name: GOTAFE Snap - My Courses interface
description: Shows the major features of the Snap 'My Courses' interface

steps.title: GOTAFE's Learning Management System (LMS) has a brand new look!
steps.content:
This tour will guide you through the major new features

When you first login, you arrive at the My Courses screen.

steps.title: Courses and units
steps.content:
Your Courses and Units appear here, once you are enrolled.

Can't see anything yet?  Don't worry, later in this tour, we will take you the GOTAFE Learner's Portal

steps.title: Updates
steps.content: Deadlines, assignment feedback, messages from your trainers and recent forum posts will all appear here.

steps.title: Search all courses
steps.content: Your trainer will give you a code to help you find and self-enrol in your course or unit.  If you don't have this information yet, discuss this with your trainer.

steps.title: Learn more about studying at GOTAFE
steps.content:
Let's go to the Learner's Portal to help you on your way.
Select 'Access the Learner's Portal', then choose 'Enrol Me'.

Access the Learner's Portal

steps.title: Enjoy your study.
steps.content: We hope that your enjoy your time with GOTAFE.
